title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) providing LLM, chat and embedding wrappers around Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat history, model management and OpenAI-compatible API toggle.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API, installable via npm.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and async streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM apps.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama chat and generate endpoints inside workflows.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Example project showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B via Ollama and build a RAG chatbot.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using OpenFaaS and Ollama to answer questions in channels.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization and Q&A commands inside notes.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-template that exposes additional REST endpoints on top of Ollama for production use.
